question: Which of the following are specific exceptions to Section 300, IPC 1860?
options: Private defence, Sudden fight without premeditation, consent.
Grave and sudden provocation, private defence, insanity.
Grave and sudden provocation, exceeding the right of private defence in good faith,
source: CLAT PG 2024 Official Question Paper with Answer Key and Detailed Solutions_1742924538304.pdf
